document_data.name: Wiston Apothecary
document_data.mainbody: '''Wiston Apothecary''' was a shop located in [[Daggerford]] that sold all manner of curative items, such as [[herb]]s and [[potion]]s. It was run by the master apothecary [[Wiston]], who originally hailed from the city of [[Yartar]].
document_data.Location: The shop was located in northern Daggerford along [[Wall Street (Daggerford)|Wall Street]] near the [[Farmer's Gate]].{{Cite interactive atlas|3990 Daggerford}}
document_data.Services:
In addition to selling goods of a restorative nature, Wiston employed a number of apprentices from the [[Physicians' Order]] to further his studies.

While Wiston himself did a fair amount of experimentation and alchemical discovery he also took credit for the findings uncovered by his subordinates.
